Conditions

  • uri-error [Condition Class]

[Condition Class] uri-error

Package

ystok.uri

Superclasses

simple-error

Subclasses

uri-parse-error

Initargs
format-control, format-arguments
Standard keyword arguments for simple errors.
Description

The condition class for URI errors.

This error is directly signaled by the uri function.
